alert.note: Alert for Eastern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Plymouth County through 915 PM EDT... At 829 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kingston, or 9 miles northwest of Plymouth, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Bridgewater, Middleborough, Pembroke, Duxbury, East Bridgewater, Kingston, Carver, Hanson, Halifax and Plympton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Massachusetts.
